HTML Markup How-To

  • There are 3 class: global, module, and submodule
  • Global has 1 word
  • Module has 2 words
  • Submodule has 3 words and located inside module
  • Module can borrow another modules but can't modify them, to modify use global class (1 word)
  • To use variant, add 1 word after main class
